DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective Visceral Manifold Unitary Device Study ass use thoracic bifurcation visceral manifold unitary device repair thoracoabdominal aortic aneurysm patient appropriate anatomy . The primary intent study assess safety preliminary effectiveness device . Additionally , study assess technical success treatment success follow-up interval .
DOC.brief_title: Visceral Manifold Unitary Device Study Repair Thoracoabdominal Aortic Aneurysms
DOC.criteria: An aneurysm maximum diameter > 5.5 cm 2 time normal diameter proximal aneurysm use orthogonal ( i.e. , perpendicular centerline ) measurement Aneurysm history growth > 0.5 cm 6 month Saccular aneurysm deem significant risk rupture Symptomatic aneurysm great 4.5 cm Axillary brachial iliac femoral access vessel morphology compatible vascular access technique , device accessory , without use surgical conduit Proximal land zone thoracic bifurcation stent graft : •≥ 2.5 cm nonaneurysmal aortic segment include previously place graft material ( neck ) distal leave subclavian artery ( LSA ) Diameter range 2642 mm Adequate distance celiac artery , order accommodate cannulation antegrade access point consider total deployed length thoracic bifurcation visceral manifold Proximal land zone unitary manifold stent graft : Nonaneurysmal aortic segment include previously place graft material ( neck ) minimum seal zone length 3 cm Diameter range 1932 mm Minimum branch vessel diameter great 5 mm Iliac artery aortic distal fixation site great equal 15 mm length diameter range 8 25 mm Age : ≥ 18 year old Life expectancy : > 1 year General exclusion Patient good candidate elect open surgical repair Can treat accordance instruction use legally market Is eligible enrollment manufacturersponsored IDE investigational site Unwilling comply followup schedule
